Test Name: Congenital Dyserythropoietic Anemia Gene Panel, Next-Generation Sequencing
Specimen Type: Peripheral blood or bone marrow aspirate
Purpose: To detect pathogenic variants in genes associated with congenital dyserythropoietic anemia using next-generation sequencing for diagnostic evaluation.
Equipment: Next-generation sequencer (e.g., Illumina MiSeq/NextSeq), spectrophotometer (Nanodrop), fluorometer (Qubit), fragment analyzer (Bioanalyzer or TapeStation)
